amendment.description: Amendment emphasizes that promotion of cybersecurity education must also include "children and young adults" along with the other targeted audiences.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in House Report 111-410 to emphasize that promotion of cybersecurity education also must include "children and young adults" along with the other targeted audiences.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 4 (Roll no. 38).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Connolly (VA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
